nodes.bodyText:
This is a presentation layer concern, not business logic. Shouldn't be in the Module.
I appreciate it may seem similar to rawMode, however that one impacts what we do with our query to the data layer - whereas this option just controls a cosmetic facade. 🤔
Surely these can just be referred to from searchStrings?
🤔 I think we can destructure object searchStrings.lastModifiedDateSelector into these variables

The change made here is  due a MUI Datepicker UI bug. If people are curious what this bug is, please grab me.
